itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson goes live at the market open to watch the insane and continuing rise of AMC and GameStop stocks fueled by r/wallstreetbets and takes a call with a 32-year-old who made $1.9 million on $GME stock — plus predictions on what happens with $AMC...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson goes live at the market open to watch the insane and continuing rise of AMC and GameStop stocks fueled by r/wallstreetbets and takes a call with a 32-year-old who made $1.9 million on $GME stock — plus predictions on what happens with $AMC from here.
